abstract: Jon Pareles observes that a sense of inertia permeated the 2011 CMJ Music Marathon; notes that while event featured a number of musical acts that deserved the attention they clamored for, many other bands sounded more interesting in their blog description than live onstage.
snippet: This year’s CMJ included many acts that fully deserved the attention they clamored for, but there was also a sense of inertia.
lead_paragraph: This year’s CMJ included many acts that fully deserved the attention they clamored for, but there was also a sense of inertia.

headline.main: A Glut of Bands, Amid a Fog of Blaring Sound
headline.print_headline: A Glut of Bands, Amid a Fog of Blaring Sound
headline.seo: At CMJ Music Marathon, a Glut of Bands and a Haze of Music
